mission: Providing accountable land law consultancy and land certificate management services.

Improving service quality through continuous improvement and team competence development.

konsultasi-hukum-pertanahan.title: Land Law Consultancy
konsultasi-hukum-pertanahan.description: Aimed at helping clients understand, analyze, and resolve various legal issues related to land and its utilization.

items.question: What are the requirements for applying for a building use rights certificate (HGB) for the first time?
items.answer: General requirements include ID card (KTP), Family Card (KK), proof of land acquisition (such as a Sale and Purchase Deed), proof of the last year's land and building tax (PBB) payment, and a statement of physical control of the land parcel.

items.question: What is the correct procedure for certificate application?
items.answer: The process begins with the collection of title documents, registration at the land office, followed by physical measurement by officers, announcement of physical and juridical data, and finally the issuance of the certificate.

legal-study.title: Legal Study Services
items: Legal issue consultancy
Preparation and provision of land legal opinions
Consultancy on compliance with applicable land and spatial planning regulations

pengurusan-sertifikat-tanah.title: Land Certificate Management Services
pengurusan-sertifikat-tanah.description: Aimed at ensuring the entire process is carried out in accordance with applicable regulations, professionally, transparently, and with integrity.

first-time.title: First-Time Land Registration
items: Assistance and physical examination of land parcels
Validation of land parcel maps
Assistance in the land certificate issuance process

rights.title: Land Rights Certificate Management
items: Management of Freehold Title (Hak Milik) certification
Management of issuance, extension, and renewal of HGB certificates
Management of issuance, extension, and renewal of HGU certificates
Management of issuance, extension, and renewal of Right to Use (Hak Pakai) certificates

transfer.title: Certificate Title Transfer
items: Checking and validation of certificates
Assistance in the preparation of Land Deed Official (PPAT) deeds
Assistance in PPH and BPHTB payments

split-merge.title: Certificate Splitting or Merging
items: Checking and validation of certificates
Validation of legal documents

lsd.title: LSD (Protected Rice Field) Certification Assistance
items: Management of Legality for LSD Utilization
Fulfillment of LSD transfer licensing documents
Assistance in KKPR licensing
Management of LSD recommendation issuance

pengukuran-lahan.title: Land Measurement
pengukuran-lahan.description: Aimed at helping ensure measurement data and land parcel boundaries are clearly structured as a basis for administration, planning, or necessary follow-up processes.

scope.title: Service Scope
items: Land parcel measurement according to client needs
Identification and affirmation of land parcel boundaries (based on documents/designation of relevant parties)
Preparation of measurement result summaries for administrative needs

docs.title: Commonly Needed Documents & Data
items: Ownership/title documents (if any)
Identity of the applicant/relevant party
Location information and known boundaries
